If you're up for something more contemporary, "The Violent Kind" might also catch your interest. This film tells a chilling tale about a group of bikers tormented by a mysterious possession and the arrival of a gang from the 1950s. Taylor Cole stars in this thriller. Enjoy the movies!

If you're interested in action and war themes, "Red Cliff" could be another great choice. Enjoy the ride through this epic tale featuring renowned actors like Wei Zhao and Takeshi Kaneshiro!
